chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
llvwli: leaderLogs_votesWithLog_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface
vvci: votes_votesWithLog_correspond_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface

Goal:
forall q1 q2 : list name, NoDup q1 -> NoDup q2 -> length q1 > div2 (length nodes) -> length q2 > div2 (length nodes) -> exists v : name, In v q1 /\ In v q2

Premises:
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
div2 = fix div2 (a : nat) : nat := match a with | S (S n) => S (div2 n) | _ => 0 end : nat -> nat Arguments div2 _%nat_scope
NoDup : forall A : Type, list A -> Prop
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
nodes = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => all_fin N : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list name Arguments nodes {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
wonElection_dedup_spec : forall l : list name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l) = true -> exists quorum : list name, NoDup quorum /\ length quorum > div2 (length nodes) /\ (forall h : name, In h quorum -> In h l)
wonElection_length : forall votes : list name, wonElection votes = true -> length votes > div2 (length nodes)
leaderLogs_votesWithLog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (t : term) (ll : list entry) (leader : Net.name), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) ->...-> Prop Arguments leaderLogs_votesWithLog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
pigeon : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l sub1 sub2 : list A, (forall a : A, In a sub1 -> In a l) -> (forall a : A, In a sub2 -> In a l) -> NoDup l -> NoDup sub1 -> NoDup sub2 -> length sub1 + length sub2 > length l -> exists a : A, In a sub1 /\ In a sub2
haveQuorum = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (_ : name) (N : logIndex) => div2 (length nodes) <? length (filter (fun h : name => N <=? assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex state) h 0) nodes) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), raft_data -> name -> logIndex -> bool Arguments haveQuorum {orig_base_params raft_params}
subset_size_eq : forall (A : Type) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> forall ys : list A, NoDup ys -> (forall x : A, In x xs -> In x ys) -> length xs = length ys -> forall x : A, In x ys -> In x xs
div2_correct : forall c a b : nat, a > div2 c -> b > div2 c -> a + b > c
handleRequestVoteReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' <> Candidate) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true)
handleRequestVoteReply_spec' : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> (type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true) /\ r = true /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ currentTerm st = t /\ votesReceived st' = h' :: votesReceived st)
incl_Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l u v : list A), ~ In a l -> incl (a :: l) v -> Add a u v -> incl l u
Build_MultiParams : forall (P : BaseParams) (name msg : Type), (forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall nodes : list name, (forall n : name, In n nodes) -> NoDup nodes -> (name -> data) -> (name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) -> (name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) -> MultiParams P
wonElection_no_dup_in : forall l1 l2 : list name, wonElection l1 = true -> NoDup l1 -> (forall x : name, In x l1 -> In x l2) -> wonElection l2 = true
handleRequestVoteReply_votesReceived : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (h' : name) (r : bool) (v : name), In v (votesReceived (handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r)) -> In v (votesReceived st) \/ r = true /\ v = h' /\ currentTerm (handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r) = t
subset_length : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall xs ys : list A, NoDup xs -> (forall x : A, In x xs -> In x ys) -> length ys >= length xs
wonElection_one_in_common : forall l l' : list name, wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l) = true -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec l') = true -> exists h : name, In h l /\ In h l'
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVoteReply (pDst p) (pSrc p) t v (nwState net (pDst p)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
NoDup_length_incl : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), NoDup l -> length l' <= length l -> incl l l' -> incl l' l
wonElection_exists_voter : forall l : list name, wonElection l = true -> exists x : name, In x l
remove_length_lt : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (xs : list A) (eq_dec : forall x0 y : A, {x0 = y} + {x0 <> y}), In x xs -> length xs > length (remove eq_dec x xs)
CommonTheorems.wonElection_length : forall l1 l2 : list name, wonElection l1 = true -> length l1 <= length l2 -> wonElection l2 = true
Add_length : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> length l' = S (length l)
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVoteReply (pDst p) (pSrc p) t v (nwState net (pDst p)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
update_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x y : A) (v : B), x = y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = v
wonElection = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (votes : list name) => S (div2 (length nodes)) <=? length votes : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list name -> bool Arguments wonElection {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
remove_length_ge : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) >= length xs - 1
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
remove_length_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) = length xs
update_diff : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x : A) (v : B) (y : A), x <> y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = sigma y
refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = (gd, d) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h') ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
